eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.cc

Class CCMain.CheckThreadViolationRepaintManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.RepaintManager
      • eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.cc.CCMain.CheckThreadViolationRepaintManager
  • Enclosing class:
    CCMain

    public static class CCMain.CheckThreadViolationRepaintManager
extends javax.swing.RepaintManager

    This class is used to detect Event Dispatch Thread rule violations.
    See How to Use Threads for more info

    This is a modification of original idea of Scott Delap.
    Initial version of ThreadCheckingRepaintManager can be found here
    Easily Find Swing Threading Mistakes

    Alex Ruiz modified to make a test fail if an EDT violation is detected.

    Author:
    Scott Delap, Alexander Potochkin https://swinghelper.dev.java.net/
